content: In the context of payroll processing, what is the technical term used to refer to a recurring 7-day period during which employees' working hours and wages are calculated and paid out?

In the context of payroll processing, the technical term used to refer to a recurring 7-day period during which employees' working hours and wages are calculated and paid out is called a "pay period" or more specifically, a "weekly pay period" if it occurs every 7 days.
